title: Our Team
team_member_1_about: Pankaj is a culinary expert with over 10 years of experience. She specializes in creating exquisite dishes that delight our customers.
team_member_2_about: Sanjeev is dedicated to ensuring that our restaurant runs smoothly and that every guest has a fantastic dining experience.
team_member_3_about: Vikas Khanna is an award winning Indian chef, restaurateur, food writer, filmmaker, humanitarian and the host of the TV Show MasterChef India..
